Waiting could potentially yield Parent_E or Parent_B later, but there is no guarantee they will apply to me (Parent_E’s top choice is Nursery_C; Parent_B’s top choice is Nursery_A). Given the immediate availability of a top-3 candidate and the risk of ending with a lower-priority applicant, I will accept Parent_C.
